data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Mandi, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Mandi to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Changgar people.
Father, convict the 10,998 believers in Mandi to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.section_summary:
the county of Mandi, Himachal Pradesh, India has a population of 999,800.

We estimate Mandi has 10,998 people who might know Jesus, 12,131 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 976,671 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 10,998 believers in the county of Mandi with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
